casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. Zzeundre Babbinbenell JACOBS
v.
STATE of Louisiana No. 2017-KH-0681 Supreme Court of Louisiana. August 3, 2018

ON SUPERVISORY WRITS TO THE NINTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT, PARISH OF RAPIDES

PER CURIAM:

Writ granted in part; otherwise denied. As the custodian of court records, the district court is ordered to provide relator with an estimate of the costs of reproducing public records relator has requested and to which he is entitled. La. Const. art. XII, § 3 ; R.S. 44:31 ; R.S. 44:31.1 ; State ex rel. Leonard v. State , 96-1889 (La. 6/13/97), 695 So.2d 1325 ; see also State ex rel. Level v. State , 99-2266 (La. 12/17/99), 751 So.2d 869 ; cf. Range v. Moreau , 96-1607 (La. 9/3/96), 678 So.2d 537 .
